Maurer (03/2012)" />   <attribute name="nco_openmp_thread_number" type="int" value="1" />   <attribute name="id" value="dist2coast_4deg_ocean" />   <attribute name="naming_authority" value="org.pacioos" />   <attribute name="Metadata_Conventions" value="Unidata Dataset Discovery v1.0, CF-1.4" />   <attribute name="Metadata_Link" value="http://pacioos.org/metadata/dist2coast_4deg_ocean.html" />   <attribute name="title" value="Distance to Nearest Coastline: 0.04-Degree Grid: Ocean" />   <attribute name="summary" value="A global data set of ocean distances from the nearest coastline. NASA's Ocean Color Group generated this data set using the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT) software package. Distances were computed with GMT using its intermediate-resolution coastline and then gridded globally at a spatial resolution of 0.04 degrees." />   <attribute name="keywords" value="Earth Science > Oceans > Coastal Process > Shorelines" />   <attribute name="keywords_vocabulary" value="GCMD Science Keywords" />   <attribute name="standard_name_vocabulary" value="CF-1.4" />   <attribute name="comment" value="These data are provided by the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC) Ocean Color Group." />   <attribute name="geospatial_lat_min" type="double" value="-90.0" />   <attribute name="geospatial_lat_max" type="double" value="90.0" />   <attribute name="geospatial_lon_min" type="double" value="-180.0" />   <attribute name="geospatial_lon_max" type="double" value="180.0" />   <attribute name="geospatial_vertical_min" type="double" value="0.0" />   <attribute name="geospatial_vertical_max" type="double" value="0.0" />   <attribute name="time_coverage_start" value="2009-06-01T00:00:00Z" />   <attribute name="time_coverage_end" value="2009-06-01T00:00:00Z" />   <attribute name="geospatial_lat_units" value="degrees_north" />   <attribute name="geospatial_lon_units" value="degrees_east" />   <attribute name="geospatial_vertical_units" value="m" />   <attribute name="geospatial_vertical_positive" value="up" />   <attribute name="time_coverage_resolution" value="P0D" />   <attribute name="creator_email" value="richard.stumpf@noaa.gov" />   <attribute name="creator_name" value="Dr. Richard P.
